sections.title: Verse 1
content: Awake, my soul, and with the sun
Thy daily stage of duty run;
Shake off dull sloth, and joyful rise
To pay thy God thy morning vows.

sections.title: Chorus
content: Praise God, from whom all blessings flow;
Praise Him, all creatures here below;
Praise Him above, ye heavenly host;
Praise Father, Son, and Holy Ghost.

sections.title: Verse 2
content: To thy great Maker praises due;
Let the bright heavens his power proclaim,
And earth her Creator's glory name.
